Question 30 
[RCC Structures : Design & Analysis of Beam and Slab]
Consider a balanced doubly-reinforced concrete section. If the material and other sectional properties 
remain unchanged, for which of the following cases will the section becomes under-reinforced?
(A) Area of tension reinforcement is increased.
(B) Area of compression reinforcement is increased.
(C) Area of tension reinforcement is decreased.
(D) Area of compression reinforcement is decreased. 
Ans. (B, C)
